name: Construct Mining Station
desc: Construct a mining station in an asteroid belt or asteroid field.

name: Construct Siphon Station
desc: Construct a siphon station in orbit around a gas giant.

name: Terraforming Control Panel
desc: Click to open the terraforming control panel for the closest player-controlled world.

name: Seed Lobsters
desc: Seed lobsters onto the nearest water world you control. You can do this an unlimited number of times if you possess Domain-era lobster gene editing equipment.
